E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 6/24/1978
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Ray Peters



Date: Thursday, 6/26/1978
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Dave Moates



Date: Friday, 6/27/1978
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Bob O'Brien



Date: Monday, 6/30/1978
Subject: Progress of Steve Macko
Dear Sir,
Steve Macko has nothing more to prove at A Modesto A's!
He has an AVG of .324 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 7/7/1978
Subject: Progress of Joe Beckwith
Dear Sir,
Joe Beckwith is doing pretty good at A Modesto A's!
He has an ERA of 2.14, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
